content.rendered:
Join us at the Warner Robins store on Russell Parkway this Saturday to participate in a book signing by some of our local authors. We have a wide variety of authors ranging from mystery to Christian living and much more! Come support our community of local authors and spend a relaxing Saturday in our bookstore!
Our authors will include Randy Toms (candidate for the Warner Robins mayoral race!), Andy Cook (Pastor at Shirley Hills Baptist Church in Warner Robins), William Haun, Barbara Lawrence, Paul Carr, and Carol Lanier.
It’ll be a fun event with six local writers!
